topic.title: Test p
topic.shortdesc: This should just test various attributes on the P tag.

body.p: this is a paragraph with no attributes -- I surely hope it works, if not we've got some major problems. Let's add some text now to make things wrap (bet you can't guess where it's from): You may have had a few "heart palpitations" in your love life recently, dear Libra. But too much is too much, and today you may feel like cooling down a bit. During this period of time, were you able to unveil the best aspects of your personality? Were you respectful of the people that were attracted to you? Try not to lose the benefits of all that great energy that surrounded you the past few days.

This is a paragraph with id=para. Let's add some text now to make things wrap (bet you can't guess where it's from): You may have had a few "heart palpitations" in your love life recently, dear Libra. But too much is too much, and today you may feel like cooling down a bit. During this period of time, were you able to unveil the best aspects of your personality? Were you respectful of the people that were attracted to you? Try not to lose the benefits of all that great energy that surrounded you the past few days.
Conref that paragraph:
this should not appear

topic.title: Everything in a paragraph
topic.shortdesc: Put stuff inside the paragraph and see how it turns out...

body.p: this is a simple paragraph.

Simple para with phrases: test apiname test bold (test boolean ->) test cite test cmdname test codeph test filepath test footnote test italic test inline image: test indexterm test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph [skipping object] test option test parmname test ph testing a quote (test state -> ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term tm to amazon test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname test wintitle test xref to the top
para with drafts: it's drafty in hereif you clean this up it will help

table.title: testing a table in an example

p.screen: put up a screen when you take down the storm window

p.pre: test pre test pre test pre

p.note: testing a note, just a plain old note, not a special note

p.msgblock: test msgblock test msgblock test msgblock

p.lq: LQ: Darryl Strawberry was sentenced to 18 months in prison Monday for violating his probation on a 1999 conviction on drug and solicitation of prostitution charges.

p.lines: test lines test lines test lines

body.p: (that was a placement=break image)
